title: SpecsSphere
subtitle: Luxury sunglasses providing website
one: A luxury sunglasses providing website with dashboard and ordering system.
two: Different Dashboard interface for admin and non admin user.
three: With Express JS backend with mongodb database.
four: Admin has order access and status change ability
five: Admin can make others admin and add product and delete product.

title: Somadhan
subtitle: An issue tracker service
two: Admin can create account and maintain issues.
three: User can create issues and see the issue development
four: User admin can communicate directly through chat when the issue is active
five: Easy change and monitoring of issue states

title: DiabeticNet
subtitle: A network and specialize services for diabetic patients
one: Provides different services related to diabetes specific education.
three: Blogs related to diabetes help to educate and make a community.
four: It provides services related to diabetes related product delivery.

title: Eideticho
subtitle: An echo of your memories
one: Eideticho is a simple app that acts as your Eidetic or photographic memory.
two: User Authentication and simple online photographic memory note storage for each user.
three: Save All the memories in each user timeline view.
four: Everyday new timeline view and saves the last 30 days memory timeline.
five: Option to save important memories permanently.

title: EduFit
subtitle: EduFit a fitness education website
one: In the site you can subscribe for different fitness learning courses
two: Learn about different product we provide.
three: You can learn about the fitness Instructors
five: You can learn more about EduFit Company.

title: Sylheti Guide
subtitle: An easy Sylheti tour guide booking site
one: A Sylhet tour booking website with tour booking system.
two: Easy user tour management with easy enrollment and cancelation.
three: With Express JS backend with mongodb database.
four: Admin can see others enrollment to set a better tour experience and help you to schedule.
five: Admin can also add new packages from add package.
